#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

{{{
cat >/etc/samba/smb.conf<<'EOF'
[global]
    workgroup = WORKGROUP
    netbios name = lemote box
    server string = file share server run on lemote minibox

    dos charset = gb2312
    unix charset = gb2312
    display charset = gb2312

    security = share
    guest account = apache

    socket options = TCP_NODELAY SO_RCVBUF=8192 SO_SNDBUF=8192
    dns proxy = no
    template shell = /bin/false
    winbind use default domain = no

    load printers = no
    printing = bsd
    printcap name = /dev/null
    show add printer wizard = no
    disable spoolss = yes

[htdocs]
    comment = Http Documents Directories
    browseable = yes
    writable = yes
    public = yes
    path = /var/www/html
EOF
}}}
